title: Improving Decision Making About Feeding Options for Dementia
text:
Summary: This study is a randomized trial to test whether a decision aid can help to improve the quality of decision making about feeding options in care of patients with dementia.
Inclusion criteria: inclusion criteria: 

 dementia diagnosis 

 advanced cognitive impairment 

 feeding problem 

 age >= 65 

 surrogate decision maker 

 
Exclusion criteria: : 

 feeding tube decision made 

 hospice 

 BMI > 26 

 major psychosis or developmental delay
